title: How Matteo Jorgenson Fits into Visma’s Multi-Leader Classics Playbook: ‘We Use All Our Cards. There’s No Hierarchy’
content:
Jorgenson bullish on tactics: 'I have a much higher chance of winning on the same team as Wout van Aert than I would racing against him.'

Read the full article at How Matteo Jorgenson Fits into Visma’s Multi-Leader Classics Playbook: ‘We Use All Our Cards. There’s No Hierarchy’ on Velo.
author: ahood
